name: PowerCharger 4269
description:
A space shooter. Get the highest score. Keep an eye on your Power™.

Keyboard controls:

  • WASD to move
  •  SHIFT to shoot
  • SPACE to dash

Gamepad controls

  • Left stick / D-pad to move
  • Any triggers to fire
  • A/B/X/Y to dash

You lose power by:

  •  crashing into enemies while NOT dashing
  • firing your weapon
  • getting hit by enemy fire

You gain power by:

  •  crashing into enemies while dashing
  • damaging enemies with your weapon
  • killing enemies

So, you know. Consider your actions, because you'll pay the price. Something like that.
